examples: It is the job of this court to rule on legal matters. We do not consider religious issues.

definitions.definition: Committed to the practice or adherence of religion.
examples: I was much more religious as a teenager than I am now.

definitions.definition: Highly dedicated , as one would be to a religion.
examples: I'm a religious fan of college basketball.

definitions.definition: Belonging or pertaining to a religious order or religious congregation .
examples: religious priest, religious sister, religious brother

secondary_definitions: Committed to the practice or adherence of religion.
Highly dedicated , as one would be to a religion.
Belonging or pertaining to a religious order or religious congregation .
